Recipe_Name: Spaghetti With Canned-Clam Sauce Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 4 tablespoons (60g) unsalted butter, cut into 4 pieces and divided
2 celery ribs (5 oz; 140g), peeled (optional) and cut into small dice
1/2 cup (30g) finely chopped fresh parsley leaves, divided
1 fresh green Thai chili (4g), thinly sliced (optional, see note)
Two (6.5-ounce; 184g) cans chopped or minced clams, clams and liquid divided
Celery leaves (pale yellow-green leaves from the celery heart), for garnish

Recipe_Name: Ackee and Saltfish Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 2 tablespoons (30ml) neutral oil, such as canola or vegetable
2 tablespoons (1 ounce; 30g) diced yellow onion, from 1/4 onion
2 heaping tablespoons (1 ounce; 30g) diced bell pepper, from 1/2 bell pepper
1/2 Scotch bonnet chile, stemmed, seeded, and minced
1 small tomato (about 2 ounces; 55g), cored and diced
2 tablespoons (3g) fresh thyme leaves and tender stems, chopped
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

Recipe_Name: Galam Plee Pad Nam Pla (Thai Stir-Fried Cabbage With Fish Sauce and Garlic) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 5 garlic cloves (20g), crushed and roughly chopped (see notes)
1/2 small head green cabbage, cored, leaves separated and cut into 2-inch pieces (yielding about 7 ounces; 200g total)

Recipe_Name: Somali Sambusas Recipe | Cook the Book
alt_Ingredients: 1 teaspoon curry powder, plus more to taste

Recipe_Name: Homemade Merguez Sausage Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 3 pounds lamb shoulder, cut into 3/4-inch cubes and gristle removed
1 pound lamb, beef, or pork fat, cut into 3/4-inch cubes
2 tablespoons freshly minced garlic (about 6 medium cloves)
Lamb casings, soaked in warm water for 30 minutes prior to use

Recipe_Name: Hot and Numbing Shredded Lamb Noodle Soup Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 3 1/2 to 4 pounds (1.5 to 1.8kg) lamb shanks or lamb neck slices
2 tablespoons (18g) Diamond Crystal kosher salt; if using table salt, use half as much by volume or the same weight
2 tablespoons (30ml) Shaoxing wine or dry sherry wine
2 quarts (1920ml) store-bought or homemade chicken stock
8-12 dried bird's eye chilies (6-10g), coarsely ground
2 tablespoons (16g) toasted cumin seeds, coarsely ground, plus extra whole seeds for serving
1 tablespoon (4g) Sichuan peppercorns, coarsely ground (see note
6 servings hand-pulled noodles (lamian) or store-bought lamian or ramen noodles (see note)
8 fresh cilantro sprigs, cut into 1-inch pieces

Recipe_Name: Obe Ata (Nigerian Red Pepper Sauce) Recipe
Ingredients: 8 red bell peppers (about 4 1/2 pounds; 2kg), stemmed, cored, and cut into roughly 1/2-inch dice
12 medium cloves garlic (about 1 head), roughly chopped
6 large plum tomatoes (about 1 3/4 pounds; 800g), cored and quartered
4 Fresno chili peppers (about 2 ounces; 55g), stemmed, seeded, and cut into roughly 1/2-inch dice (see note)
4 habanero or Scotch bonnet peppers (about 1 ounce; 30g), stemmed, seeded, and cut into roughly 1/2-inch dice (see note)
2 large red onions (about 1 3/4 pounds; 800g), peeled and cut into roughly 1/2-inch dice
One 2-inch segment peeled fresh ginger (about 3/4 ounce; 20g), roughly chopped
1 quart (1L) homemade chicken stock or store-bought, low-sodium broth, or vegetable stock
9 tablespoons (135ml) canola or other neutral oil
1/2 teaspoon Nigerian curry powder, such as Lion's Brand, or more to taste (optional, see note)
Ground Cameroon pepper, to taste (see note)
Torn fresh basil leaves, for garnish (optional)

Recipe_Name: Garlic Fried Rice Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1/4 cup plus 1 tablespoon (75ml) canola oil or other neutral oil
8 garlic cloves, crushed and sliced thinly
4 cups cooked white rice (24 ounces; 700g), preferably long-grain, but any variety will do

Recipe_Name: Lamb Biryani With Saffron, Yogurt, and Caramelized Onions Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 2 pounds (910g) boneless leg of lamb, trimmed of excess fat and cut into 1-inch (2cm) cubes
6 medium garlic cloves, peeled and finely grated
One 2–inch piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated
3 teaspoons Diamond Crystal kosher salt, divided; if using table salt, use half as much by volume
1/4 cup (60 ml) plus 2 teaspoons (10ml) ghee or neutral oil, such as grapeseed, divided
2 large yellow or white onions (26 ounces; 750g total), sliced thinly
5 green cardamom pods, lightly cracked, divided
1 teaspoon garam masala, store-bought or homemade
1 cup (240ml) water or low-sodium stock (lamb, beef, or chicken)
1/4 cup (60ml) fresh lemon or lime juice
1 bunch fresh cilantro leaves and tender stems, chopped
1 fresh green chile, such as a serrano or Thai bird, minced

Recipe_Name: Cuban-Style Pollo a la Plancha (Marinated and Griddled Chicken) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1/4 cup (60ml) freshly squeezed orange juice (from about 1 orange)
1/4 cup (60ml) freshly squeezed lime juice (from about 2 limes)
4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves (about 10 ounces; 285g each) or 8 chicken cutlets
1 tablespoon (15ml) neutral oil such as canola or vegetable, plus more as needed
1 large white or yellow onion (about 3/4 pound; 340g); sliced crosswise into 1/4 inch thick rings
Cooked long-grain rice and black beans, for serving

Recipe_Name: Chicken Tagine With Pistachios, Dried Figs, and Chickpeas Recipe
Ingredients: 1 large or two medium yellow onions (about 1 pound; 450g), thinly sliced
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 whole chicken legs (about 3 pounds; 1.3kg total), split into drumsticks and thighs
1 1/2 cups (9 ounces; 255g) cooked and drained chickpeas or one drained 15-ounce can chickpeas
Picked leaves of fresh herbs like mint, cilantro, and/or parsley, for garnish
Cooked long grain rice or couscous, for serving

Recipe_Name: Nigerian Beef Suya (Spiced Grilled Skewers) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1/2 cup (spooned) roasted groundnut/peanut butter powder (40g) (see note)
1 tablespoon (9g) Diamond Crystal kosher salt; if using table salt, use half as much by volume
1/2 teaspoon ground grains of selim or grains of paradise (optional; see note)
1 pound (450g) beef flank or sirloin steak (see note)
3 tablespoons (45ml) peanut oil, or neutral-flavored oil, such as canola

Recipe_Name: Pan con Tomate (Spanish-Style Grilled Bread With Tomato) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1 loaf ciabatta, split in half horizontally lengthwise, cut crosswise into 1 1/2-inch slices
2 medium cloves garlic, split in half
Flaky sea salt, such as Maldon or fleur de sel

Recipe_Name: Pasta With Beans and Greens Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1 pound 5 ounces (3 cups; 600g) cooked dry white beans (such as cannellini or Great Northern) or two (15-ounce; 425g) cans low-sodium white beans, drained and rinsed (see note)
1 cup (240ml) bean cooking liquid, homemade or store-bought low-sodium chicken stock, or vegetable stock (see note)
12 ounces (350g) short tubular pasta, such as paccheri or rigatoni
1 bunch (8 ounces; 225g) lacinato kale, tough stems removed, leaves cut into 2-inch pieces (see note)
2 1/4 ounces (3/4 cup; 65g) grated Pecorino Romano cheese, divided

Recipe_Name: Homemade Pollo Campero (Central American–Style Fried Chicken) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1/2 cup (3 ounces; 85g) Diamond Crystal kosher salt; for table salt use half as much by volume or the same weight
10 bone-in chicken pieces (about 4 pounds/1.8kg total), preferably drumsticks and thighs
1 1/2 tablespoons (3/4 ounce; 20g) seasoning salt, such as Lawry's
Vegetable or other neutral oil, for frying (about 4 cups/1L)

Recipe_Name: Plov (Uzbek Rice Pilaf) Recipe
Ingredients: 1/4 cup oil (or lamb or duck fat)
2 large carrots, shredded on the small holes of a box grater
2 medium onions, sliced into thin half moons
2 teaspoons coriander, toasted and freshly ground
1 1/2 teaspoons cumin, toasted and freshly ground

Recipe_Name: Rice Wine and Soy Sauce Dressing Recipe
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons peeled and finely grated ginger
1 fresh bird's eye chili, seeded and chopped

Recipe_Name: Taiwanese Pineapple Cakes (Fung Li Su) Recipe
Ingredients: 1 cup (7 ounces) plus 2 tablespoons sugar, divided

Recipe_Name: Durian Smoothie Recipe
Crispy Bánh Mì Spring Rolls With Creamy Chili Mayo Recipe
Ingredients: 1 large carrot, cut into 3-inch matchsticks 1/8 inch thick (about 2 cups)
1 small daikon radish, cut into 3-inch matchsticks 1/8 inch thick (about 2 cups)
2 tablespoons white distilled or rice wine vinegar
30 to 40 five-inch frozen spring roll wrappers, thawed
1 large cucumber, peeled, cored, and cut into 3-inch sticks about 1/4-inch wide (30 to 40 sticks total)
2 whole jalapeño peppers, cored, seeded, and cut into 3-inch sticks about 1/8th inch thick (30 to 40 sticks total)
1 bunch cilantro, leaves and thin stems only
2 tablespoons chili garlic sauce such as sambal oelek or sriracha, or more to taste

Recipe_Name: Stir-Fried Greens with Rice Wine Recipe
Ingredients: 1 bunch water spinach or sweet potato greens, about 10 ounces
A pinch of sugar, or to taste

Recipe_Name: Tea Smoked Fish Recipe
Ingredients: ¼ cup vermouth or rice wine, such as sake or Shaoxing rice wine
1 teaspoon each of salt and crushed peppercorns (black, Sichuan, mixed, etc.)
1/3 cup rice, preferably jasmine or long-grain
1/4 cup tea, such as jasmine or black

Recipe_Name: Seriously Asian: Crab Two Ways Recipe
Ingredients: 1 live Dungeness crab, about 2 to 3 pounds
A few garlic cloves, smashed and coarsely chopped
2 green onions, cut into 1 inch segments
1/4 to 1/2 of a Dungeness crab, about 1 pound
1 green onions, cut into 1 inch segments
A platter of freshly made rice noodles, or a small package of cellophane noodles

Recipe_Name: How to Make Kerisik Recipe
Chinese Noodles with Baked Sriracha Ribs Recipe
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon ground chili, such as ancho
2 1/2 tablespoons Asian chili sauce (such as sambal oelek), divided
1/4 cup sliced mixed mushrooms, such as Portobello, shiitake, and oyster
1 small fresh red chili, thinly sliced
5 cups homemade or store-bought low-sodium chicken stock
12 ounces fresh (8 ounces dried) Chinese egg noodles

Recipe_Name: Seaweed Salad Recipe
Ingredients: handful of dried seaweed, enough for 2 cups when rehydrated

Recipe_Name: Kimchi Dumplings Recipe
Ingredients: 1 cup finely diced napa cabbage kimchi

Recipe_Name: Quick Asian Chili-Lime Chicken Soup Recipe
Ingredients: 12 ounces boneless, skinless, chicken breast, sliced into 1/4-inch strips
6 cups homemade or store-bought low-sodium chicken stock
2 to 3 tablespoons lime juice from 3 large limes
8 ounces white mushrooms, trimmed and sliced into 1/2-inch slices
1 large bunch cilantro, roots trimmed, rinsed
1 medium onion, sliced into thin rings

Recipe_Name: Coleslaw in Chinese-style Dressing Recipe
Ingredients: 1 teaspoon chili oil, or to taste
2 tablespoons Chinkiang or rice vinegar, or to taste
1/2 head of cabbage, thinly cut or shredded (about 2 quarts shredded cabbage)
1 medium carrot, grated on the large holes of a box grater

Recipe_Name: Spicy Warm Silken Tofu With Celery and Cilantro Salad Recipe
Ingredients: 1 stalk celery, cut into thin 2-inch matchsticks
1/2 cup fresh cilantro leaves and tender stems
3 whole scallions, sliced into thin slicers at an acute bias
1 tablespoon sesame paste (such as tahini), or peanut butter
2 teaspoons fermented chili broad bean paste (see note)
1/4 cup Chinese roasted chili oil (see note)
1 medium clove garlic, finely minced (about 1 teaspoon)

Recipe_Name: Jamie Oliver's Steamed Asian Chicken "Parcels" Recipe
Ingredients: 6 scallions, white and light green parts, roughly chopped
1 to 2 fresh small red chili peppers
4 trimmed boneless skinless chicken thighs, roughly chopped (about 1 pound)
2 tablespoons juice and 2 teaspoons grated zest from 2 limes
Your choice of dipping sauce, such as prepared sweet chili sauce, or hoisin thinned with soy sauce

Recipe_Name: Taiwanese Turkey Rice Recipe
Ingredients: 2 pounds (900g) bone-in turkey pieces, such as the breast or legs, breasts cut through the bone into large chunk, legs divided into drumsticks and thighs (see note)

Recipe_Name: Fried Bee Hoon (Singapore Noodles) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 4 ounces green Thai bird chilies, seeds removed, sliced
1 teaspoon plus 2 tablespoons soy sauce, divided
4 medium shallots, peeled and finely sliced (about 1 cup)
4 ounces baby bok choy leaves (about 1 1/2 cups)
5 ounces dried rice vermicelli, soaked in cool water for 30 minutes

Recipe_Name: Bharazi (Pigeon Peas in Coconut Cream) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1 cup dry pigeon peas or 1 (19 ounces; 540ml) can pigeon peas (use black pigeon peas)
1 (13 ounces; 394ml) can coconut milk or cream
1 whole chili, slit down the sides (jalapeño or serrano)
1/2 teaspoon green chilli paste and/or sambal oelek, or to taste

Recipe_Name: Eggplant and Tomato Sauce With Israeli Couscous Recipe
Ingredients: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
3 medium cloves garlic, grated with a Microplane or minced (about 1 tablespoon)
1 large eggplant, diced (about 1 quart diced egg plant)
8 plum tomatoes, cored and roughly chopped (about 3 cups chopped tomatoes)

Recipe_Name: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms (Pasta ai Funghi) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1 cup (240ml) homemade or store-bought low sodium chicken stock (see note)
1 1/2 teaspoons (4g) powdered gelatin, such as Knox
1 1/2 pounds (675g) mixed mushrooms (such as shiitake, oyster, maitake, beech, cremini, and chanterelles), cleaned, trimmed, and thinly sliced or torn by hand (see note)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/2 cup (120ml) dry white wine or 1/4 cup (60ml) dry sherry
1 pound (450g) short dried pasta (such as casarecce or gemelli) or long fresh egg-dough pasta (such as tagliatelle or fettuccine)
1/4 cup (10g) chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley leaves

Recipe_Name: Coconut- and Ají Amarillo–Braised Chicken Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 2 tablespoons (30ml) coconut oil or any neutral-flavored oil
1/4 to 1/2 cup (60 to 120ml) ají amarillo paste (see note)
1/2 small butternut squash (1 1/4 pounds; 600g), peeled, seeded, and cut into 1-inch-thick slices
3/4 cup fresh or frozen peas (3 1/2 ounces; 100g)
1/2 bunch fresh cilantro leaves and tender stems (1 ounce; 30g), roughly chopped
Cooked rice or boiled yuca, for serving

Recipe_Name: Alfajores Con Cajeta (Vanilla Shortbread With Goat's-Milk Toffee) Recipe
Ingredients: 4 ounces all-purpose flour (3/4 cup plus 1 tablespoon; 115g)
2 ounces powdered sugar (1/2 cup; 55g), plus more for dusting
4 ounces cold unsalted butter (1 stick; 115g), cut into 1/4-inch pieces

Recipe_Name: Cuñapes/Pão de Queijo (South American Cheesy Bread) Recipe
Ingredients: 320 grams (about 2 1/4 cups) sour tapioca starch (see note)
8 grams (2 teaspoons) Diamond crystal kosher salt; for table salt, use about half as much by volume or the same by weight
160 grams (2/3 cup) whole milk, cold or scalded
100 grams (3 1/2 ounces) sharp Cheddar cheese, chopped
160 grams (5.7 ounces) Grana Padano cheese, chopped

Recipe_Name: Chimichurri Sauce Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1 cup packed fresh parsley, washed and dried
1 teaspoon (4g) Diamond Crystal kosher salt; for table salt, use about half as much by volume or the same weight

Recipe_Name: Kanuchi (Cherokee Pureed Nut Soup) Recipe
Ingredients: 12 ounces (340g) raw shelled hickory nuts or pecans (see note)
1 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more as needed
1 cup cooked and drained whole or cracked hominy, or 1 large sweet potato (1 pound 6 ounces; 625g), peeled, cut into 1/2-inch dice, and roasted (see note)

Recipe_Name: The Best Oven-Fried Buffalo Wings Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 2 pounds (900g) chicken wings, cut into drumettes and flats
2 teaspoons (10g) kosher salt; for table salt use half as much by volume or the same weight

Recipe_Name: 3-Ingredient Stovetop Mac and Cheese Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 6 ounces (170g) grated mild or medium cheddar cheese, or any good melting cheese, such as Fontina, Gruyère, or Jack

Recipe_Name: Homemade Pita Bread Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1 tablespoon (15ml) extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for oiling the bowl
2 cups all-purpose flour (10 ounces; 280g), plus more for dusting

Recipe_Name: The Best Baba Ganoush Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 3 medium Italian eggplants (about 2 pounds/900g total), pricked all over with a fork
2 tablespoons (30 ml) lemon juice from 1 lemon, plus more as desired
1/3 cup (80 ml) extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for serving

Recipe_Name: Traditional Toum (Lebanese Garlic Sauce) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 2 teaspoons Diamond Crystal kosher salt (for table salt, use 1 teaspoon)
1/4 cup (60g) fresh lemon juice from about 2 lemons, divided
3 cups (600g) neutral oil, such as grapeseed or canola oil, divided

Recipe_Name: British Curry Sauce Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1 medium onion, grated on the large holes of a box grater (about 155g)
2 medium cloves garlic, finely chopped (4g or about 2 teaspoons)
1-inch piece of ginger, peeled and finely chopped (12g or about 1 tablespoon
1/2 teaspoon curry powder, such as Madras
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste

Recipe_Name: How to Make Crème Fraîche (in One Easy Step!) Recipe
Serious Eats' Halal Cart-Style Chicken and Rice With White Sauce
alt_Ingredients: Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken thighs, trimmed of excess fat (6 to 8 thighs)
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
Fluffy pocketless pita bread, brushed in butter, lightly toasted, and cut into 1 × 3-inch strips

Recipe_Name: Salpicón (Nicaraguan Minced Meat) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 2 pounds beef round, cut into 1 1/2 inch cubes
1 large green bell pepper, cored, seeded, and cut into 1 inch pieces
1 large white or yellow onion, peeled and cut into 1 inch pieces
4 medium garlic cloves, peeled and smashed

Recipe_Name: Gallopinto (Nicaraguan Rice and Beans) Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1 (16-ounce) bag dried small red or black beans
1 medium yellow onion, finely chopped (about 1 cup), divided
3 cups water or low-sodium chicken broth
1/2 green bell pepper, cored and seeded

Recipe_Name: Hearts of Palm Salsa
Ingredients: 1 pound (450g) ripe plum tomatoes (about 5 tomatoes), cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 teaspoon (4g) Diamond Crystal kosher salt, plus more for seasoning; for table salt, use half as much by volume or equal amount by weight
One 14-ounce (400g) can hearts of palm, drained and cut into 1/4-inch dice
2 medium garlic cloves (10g), finely grated or minced
1 jalapeño chile (about 1 1/2 ounces; 45g), stemmed, seeded, and finely diced
1/4 cup (12g) roughly chopped fresh cilantro leaves
1 tablespoon (15ml) fresh lime juice from 1 lime

Recipe_Name: Jamaican Cornmeal Porridge With Coconut and Condensed Milks Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 3/4 cup (175ml) condensed milk, or to taste, plus more for drizzling (optional)

Recipe_Name: Jamaican Pepper Shrimp Recipe
alt_Ingredients: 1 pound (455g) large shell-on shrimp, preferably head-on, rinsed
Half of 1 medium (8-ounce; 225g) red bell pepper, stemmed, seeded, and finely diced
Half of 1 medium (8-ounce; 225g) yellow onion, finely diced
1 tablespoon (15ml) annatto oil or neutral oil such as vegetable oil
1 1/2 teaspoons (6g) Diamond Crystal kosher salt; for table salt use half as much by volume or the same weight, plus more if needed
